explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of Random Forest (RF) model and Fuzzy C-Means (FCM) clustering algorithm, which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The Random Forest model is a supervised learning algorithm used for classification tasks in this study.
explanations.classification: The improved RF model is used for classification tasks in the risk early warning system.
explanations.decision tree: Random Forest is an ensemble learning method that operates by constructing multiple decision trees.
explanations.clustering: The Fuzzy C-Means (FCM) clustering algorithm is used for pre-processing sample data to improve data classification efficiency and accuracy.
